name: HOPE Foundation

address: 18 Tejus Saraswati Ammal Road, Maruti Sewa Nagar

briefDescription: Our vision is simple: to bring hope to those with none and to change the lives of everyone we come into contact with - our donors, volunteers, staff, NGO partners, government, and the poor whom we serve.HOPE foundation is a compassionate but non-sectarian charity that changes lives by harnessing the compassion and commitment of dedicated staff and volunteers to deliver sustainable, high-impact, community-based services to the poor and needy.
